data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Gelsenkirchen.
In the minute 2, Throw-in for Freiburg in their own half.
Schalke awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Schalke's Amine Harit gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Freiburg defender.
In the minute 6, Freiburg to take a throw-in in Schalke territory.
In Gelsenkirchen, Roland Sallai of Freiburg is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Ball safe as Freiburg is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 9, Throw-in Schalke.
Vincenzo Grifo gets his shot on target but fails to score for Freiburg.
Freiburg drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 14, Sven Jablonski signals a throw-in for Freiburg, close to Schalke's area.
Schalke have a goal kick.
Throw-in high up the field for Freiburg in Gelsenkirchen.
In the minute 16, Corner awarded to Freiburg.
Goal kick for Schalke at VELTINS-Arena.
Throw-in for Schalke at VELTINS-Arena.
In the minute 18, Schalke are coming forward and Suat Serdar gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Freiburg goal kick.
In the minute 19, Freiburg awarded a free kick in their own half.
Sven Jablonski awards the away team a throw-in.
Benito Raman for Schalke has been booked by Sven Jablonski and receives a first yellow card.
Can Schalke get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Freiburg's half?
In the minute 21, Schalke awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Schalke at VELTINS-Arena.
Free kick for Freiburg in their own half.
In the minute 23, In Gelsenkirchen a free kick has been awarded the away team.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Sven Jablonski signals a Freiburg throw-in in Schalke's half.
In the minute 26, Nils Petersen (Freiburg) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Throw-in for Freiburg in the half of Schalke.
Throw-in Freiburg.
In the minute 29, Sven Jablonski awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Schalke in the half of Freiburg.
Can Schalke get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Freiburg's half?
In the minute 30, Sven Jablonski signals a Schalke throw-in in Freiburg's half.
Schalke have been awarded a corner by Sven Jablonski.
Sven Jablonski awards Freiburg a goal kick.
In the minute 32, Ball safe as Freiburg is awarded a throw-in in their half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Schalke in their own half.
In the minute 35, Schalke awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Freiburg to take a throw-in in Schalke territory.
Schalke's Suat Serdar is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 36, Throw-in for Schalke close to the penalty box.
Baptiste Santamaria (Freiburg) has received a first yellow card.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 37, Throw-in for Freiburg at VELTINS-Arena.
Sven Jablonski awards the away team a throw-in.
Freiburg's Jonathan Schmid breaks free at VELTINS-Arena. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 39, It's a goal kick for the home team in Gelsenkirchen.
Benito Raman for Schalke gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Sven Jablonski awards Freiburg a goal kick.
In the minute 41, Throw-in Freiburg.
Freiburg have been awarded a corner by Sven Jablonski.
Sven Jablonski signals a free kick to Schalke.
In the minute 44, Free kick for Schalke in the half of Freiburg.
In Gelsenkirchen Schalke attack through Benito Raman. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Freiburg goal kick.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over at VELTINS-Arena.
The second half has started at VELTINS-Arena.
Free kick Freiburg.
In the minute 47, Sven Jablonski signals a free kick to Freiburg in their own half.
Schalke are pushing forward but Nassim Boujellab's finish is wide of the goal.
Freiburg have a goal kick.
In the minute 49, Schalke to take a throw-in in Freiburg territory.
Freiburg move into a 0-1 lead through a Roland Sallai header.
Jonathan Schmid instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 51, Sven Jablonski signals a free kick to Freiburg in their own half.
Free kick for Schalke in their own half.
Nassim Boujellab of Schalke smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 54, Freiburg needs to be cautious. Schalke have an attacking throw-in.
Can Schalke get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Freiburg's half?
Ball safe as Freiburg is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 56, Throw-in for Schalke in their own half.
Throw-in for Schalke in the half of Freiburg.
Can Schalke capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
In the minute 58, Schalke have a dangerous throw-in.
Freiburg awarded a free kick in their own half.
Freiburg push upfield and Roland Sallai gets his head to the ball. The attempt is cleared by an alert Schalke defence.
In the minute 60, Sven Jablonski signals a free kick to Schalke in their own half.
Christian Streich (Freiburg) is making a first substitution, with Lucas Holer replacing Nils Petersen.
Free kick for Freiburg in their own half.
In the minute 62, Free kick in a good position for Freiburg!
Freiburg's Jonathan Schmid gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Goal kick for Schalke at VELTINS-Arena.
In the minute 64, Freiburg to take a throw-in in Schalke territory.
Can Schalke get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Freiburg's half?
Schalke awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 68, Goal! Roland Sallai extends Freiburg's lead to 0-2.
That's a fine assist from Vincenzo Grifo.
Christian Streich is making the team's second substitution at VELTINS-Arena with Ermedin Demirovic replacing Roland Sallai.
In the minute 69, Chang-Hoon Kwon is on a sub for Vincenzo Grifo for Freiburg.
Free kick Schalke.
Free kick for Freiburg in their own half.
In the minute 70, The home team replace Amine Harit with Ahmed Kutucu.
Can Schalke capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Freiburg's half?
Freiburg have a goal kick.
In the minute 73, The home team have replaced Omar Mascarell with Alessandro Schopf. This is the second substitution made today by Manuel Baum.
Hamza Mendyl is replacing Benito Raman for Schalke at VELTINS-Arena.
Ball safe as Schalke is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 75, Sven Jablonski awards Schalke a goal kick.
Sven Jablonski awards the home team a throw-in.
Sven Jablonski signals a Freiburg throw-in in Schalke's half.
In the minute 77, Throw-in for Schalke in their own half.
Freiburg awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Gelsenkirchen a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 79, Sven Jablonski signals a free kick to Schalke in their own half.
Throw-in for Schalke in the half of Freiburg.
Throw-in Schalke.
In the minute 80, Free kick for Freiburg in their own half.
Freiburg awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Freiburg at VELTINS-Arena.
In the minute 83, Important block from the Schalke defence as Chang-Hoon Kwon fires in a strike for Freiburg.
Freiburg drive upfield and Baptiste Santamaria gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Schalke defender.
Sven Jablonski signals a free kick to Freiburg.
In the minute 83, Suat Serdar is booked for the home team.
Sven Jablonski signals a free kick to Schalke in their own half.
Sven Jablonski awards the home team a throw-in.
Freiburg awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 86, Matthew Hoppe is replacing Rabbi Matondo for Schalke at VELTINS-Arena.
Corner awarded to Schalke.
In the minute 88, Ball goes out of play for a Freiburg goal kick.
Schalke push forward at VELTINS-Arena and Salif Sane gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Freiburg defence.
Freiburg awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in Schalke.
3 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Freiburg pushes forward through Ermedin Demirovic, whose finish on goal is saved.
Can Freiburg get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Schalke's half?
Corner awarded to Freiburg.
Throw-in for Schalke in the half of Freiburg.
Sven Jablonski blows to end the match. The final score is 0-2.
Christian Streich is making the team's fourth substitution at VELTINS-Arena with Lino Tempelmann replacing Baptiste Santamaria.
The away team have replaced Jonathan Schmid with Amir Abrashi. This is the fifth substitution made today by Christian Streich.
